name: SCNSceneSourceStatus
desc: Constants identifying phases of SceneKit’s scene loading process, used in a SCNSceneSourceStatusHandler block.

items.name: case error
items.desc: An error occurred when SceneKit attempted to load the scene.

items.name: case parsing
items.desc: SceneKit has begun deserializing the source file.

items.name: case validating
items.desc: SceneKit has begun validating the scene file’s format.

items.name: case processing
items.desc: SceneKit has begun generating scene graph objects from the scene file’s contents.

items.name: case complete
items.desc: SceneKit has successfully finished loading the scene file’s contents.
